item.title: Pokemon Fans Are Already Putting Together Their Legends Z-A Teams
item.description:
Summary

  • Fans are eagerly planning Pokemon Legends: Z-A teams based on rumors of new Mega Evolutions.
  • The game is set for release on October 16, with pre-orders opening in June for Switch and Switch 2.
  • Veteran Pokemon fans are strategizing team compositions ahead of the game's launch, anticipating more details to come.

Some Pokemon Legends: Z-A fans are already planning their teams months before the game's release and sharing them with the community. The anticipation for Pokemon Legends: Z-A continues to build up as rumors tease the addition of several new Mega Evolutions.

Since it was announced in February 2024, Pokemon Legends: Z-A has become one of the most anticipated releases of 2025. Earlier in May, The Pokemon Company confirmed that Pokemon Legends: Z-A is coming on October 16. The developers also revealed that pre-orders for the Nintendo Switch and Switch 2 editions will open on June 5 in the US and June 11 in the EU. The game is still quite a few months away, but fans who have already decided upon getting it have their Pokemon lineup all planned out.

Over on the Pokemon Legends: Z-A Reddit forum, fans have begun to share their desired teams, including which starter they would pick and which monsters they hope will be featured. User Gaming_Lot revealed they would include Emboar, Tepig's evolution, as well as Aggron, should it appear in the Pokedex. If Zygarde is available early in the game, they would also like to catch it. Another fan, DominicDGibson, said they want a team with Meganium, Blastoise, and Hawlucha. They stated this is their ideal team if the leaks about Pokemon Legends: Z-A 's new Mega Evolutions turn out to be true. Earlier reports suggested that there would be Mega forms for Emboar, Meganium, Feraligatr, Hawlucha, Dragonite, Pyroar, and more.

Pokemon Legends: Z-A Fans Share Their Planned-Ahead Teams

Other fans have also built their teams based on the speculated Mega Evolutions, like Delpika, who wishes to have Delphox in their lineup. User TheIngloriousBIG also based their team on previous leaks, though they included many Pokemon that already got Mega Evolutions in previous installments. Some of them have been confirmed to return through Pokemon Legends: Z-A official promotional images, such as Mega Lucario and Mega Charizard X. On the other hand, there are fans like GeologistSea4107 who are planning to have fewer Megas and instead go for their favorite monkey Pokemon like Simisage and Simisear.

For many veteran Pokemon fans who are well-versed in team composition, planning a team months before a game's release can be quite useful. The Pokemon Company has revealed some details about Pokemon Legends: Z-A , but much is still left to speculation. Fortunately for fans, a new Pokemon Presents event is scheduled for July 22, where the developers will likely unveil more gameplay aspects, characters, and potentially Mega Evolutions.

item.title: Monopoly GO: When is the Next Sticker Boom Event?
item.description:
Stickers are an important collectible item in Monopoly GO . Players collect them by various methods and earn rewards by completing their Sticker Sets. Collecting stickers can prove to be a hassle for many players, since there are only limited ways to get your hands on them. Luckily, Monopoly GO allows players to cash out on big rewards, including stickers, with the help of in-game events.

A Sticker Boom is an in-game event in Monopoly GO that increases the sticker count for players when they open a sticker pack. However, like other in-game events, this is a time-sensitive event and appears for a very short duration. With this guide, Monopoly GO players can learn more about the Sticker Boom Event and when to expect next one.

Updated on May 31, 2025, by Usama Ali: With roughly a month left of the Star Wars GO album, Monopoly GO players are in a race against time to collect stickers and complete their galactic collections. The tension is building, and players are eagerly anticipating the next Sticker Boom to supercharge their sticker hunt. As the end date approaches, players can expect more frequent Sticker Booms to help them complete their sets. This guide has now been updated with details of the upcoming Sticker Boom flash events in Monopoly GO.

What Is a Sticker Boom Event in Monopoly GO?

During a Sticker Boom, players can temporarily collect more stickers than the usual amount when opening sticker packs. This makes it a great opportunity to complete sticker sets and unlock rewards. Like other flash events, a Sticker Boom is only active for a limited time, so players need to be ready to take advantage of it when it occurs.

Sticker Booms can be very helpful, especially at the mid and late stages of a sticker album. Since the ongoing album has been live for a few weeks, many players have already made significant progress in their collections. However, as they approach the final stages of completing their albums, it can become increasingly difficult to obtain the remaining stickers.

This is where Sticker Booms can be a game-changer. By increasing the number of stickers obtained from regular packs, Sticker Booms can help players close their albums faster and win the grand prize.

The table below showcases the number of stickers included in a pack, with and without the Sticker Boom event.

Sticker Pack

With Sticker Boom Event

Without Sticker Boom Event

Green (1-Star Stickers)

3

1

Orange (2-Star Stickers)

5

2

Pink (3-Star Stickers)

5

2

Blue (4-Star Stickers)

6

4

Purple (5-Star Stickers)

9

6

Since the Sticker Boom is active for a very short time (usually 10-20 minutes), players must aim to open their sticker packs while it is active.

When is the Next Sticker Boom Event in Monopoly GO?

Sticker Booms are your golden opportunity to snag extra stickers from packs for a limited time. These events can boost your chances of finding those rare and much-needed cards. Since these special events don't happen every day, it's more important than ever to make the most of them whenever they pop up.

Whenever a Sticker Boom is live, make sure to take full advantage of it by opening up your Sticker Vaults.

As the Star Wars GO album enters its final month, players can expect more Sticker Boom events. The next one is scheduled to run from June 3 at 9 AM EST to June 4 at 8:59 AM EST , so make sure to log in and take full advantage of it.

Scopely can change event schedules at any time. Always check the official Monopoly GO announcements for the latest updates on the Sticker Boom.

Best Strategy For Sticker Boom Flash Event

In order to make the most out of the Sticker Boom event, players should try to collect as many stars as possible and try to have at least 700 stars before the Sticker Boom starts. This way, they can redeem these stars for a Gold Vault, which contains one Blue sticker pack, one five-star Purple sticker pack and a Swap Pack.

It's also a good idea to wait for the Sticker Boom event to start before opening your community chest, as it has a chance to reward you with a Purple Sticker Pack.

Monopoly Go!
1596
8.8 /10
Released
April 11, 2023

item.title: Tainted Grail The Fall Of Avalon: How To Beat Secret Mistbearer Boss
item.description:
Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon offers different regions for players to explore, each offering a range of quests and secrets of its own. If players set out to explore the lands and enter darker regions of the map, they're bound to encounter mystical creatures to slay and loot unique rewards from them. The Mistbearer is one of the secret bosses players encounter in the Horns of the South, residing in the deepest parts of the ancient cave. Here's the best way to beat it.

Where to Find the Secret Mistbearer Boss in Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon

Players can find the Mistbearer boss in the northernmost part of the Horns of the South, in the Ancient Cave POI in Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon . The area is located in the northwest of All-Mothers Temple, just beyond the Ancient Cromlech.

Once you head up the winding trail, you'll encounter some enemies along the way. After reaching the marker above, you'll spot a huge gate that can be entered. Inside, you'll meet Taranis, who'll talk to you about hunting a Mistbearer. Simply exhaust all his dialog options, preferably without antagonizing him, and it'll start the Whispers in the Dark quest .

Now, continue down the twisting and turning cave network and head to the quest marker. You'll arrive in an open area with a large tree, and interacting with it will start the boss fight with the Mistbearer.

How to Beat the Mistbearer Boss

Mistbearer is a secret boss in Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon, with a slender floating body wearing a skull mask with antlers on its head. It has three phases, and its toughness will depend on the difficulty you're playing the game on. However, its moves are easy to dodge and counter , so experienced players won't have any problems dealing with it.

Melee weapons like swords and dual-wielding daggers are recommended for this fight.

Here's a breakdown of all its phases and how you can beat the boss with ease.

  • Phase One : Mistbearer will stand in the middle of the arena and summon Mistlings with its lantern. You'll need to either use a melee or high-damage ranged weapon to damage the boss by aiming at its head.
  • Phase Two : Once you've damaged the boss enough, it'll disappear into a cloud of mist and send some Mistlings to deal with you. You can damage these spectral creatures with your weapons. However, you can also use the Blood Transfusion spell here to gain some HP back. Once the minions are eliminated, the Mistbearer will appear, and you'll need to start targeting it immediately.
  • Phase Three : In this phase, the Mistbearer will summon identical clones of itself, and you'll need to find its real body to inflict damage. This phase isn't that difficult, as the clones can quickly vanish on just one hit from your weapon.

Once you've defeated the Mistbearer, you'll receive the following rewards.

  • 5x Wyrdplasm
  • 1x Wyrdlantern
  • 1x Unfading Ember
  • 1x Evil Eye
  • 1x Mistbearer's Horn

After defeating the creature, return to Taranis and update him on defeating the Mistbearer. If you didn't antagonize him before, you'll be able to meet up with him later on in Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon .

6 Images
6 Images

item.title: All Story Quests In Fantasy Life I (Chapter List)
item.description:
Fantasy Life I: The Girl Who Steals Time is a game that slowly opens up its world for players to explore and meet new NPCs. There are tons of activities to do, lives to master, and places to explore, which can take quite a while for players to do. Similarly, its story-based quests slowly take players through this mystical world, as the overarching story slowly unravels before our eyes. To get a gauge on what to expect, here's a complete list of story quests and chapters in the game.

All Chapters & Story Quests in Fantasy Life I

The story of Fantasy Life I is divided into seven chapters , each allowing players to explore a different region of its vibrant world. While the story quests are few, they're quite long, filled with additional activities for players to indulge in and have a pretty great time. Players will slowly learn the secrets of this new world that they were forcefully pulled into, make new friends along the way, and save the world from ending.

So, here's a complete list of all the story-related quests and chapters they'll experience in Fantasy Life I .

Chapters

Story Quests

Chapter 1

Life on a Mysterious Island

Chapter 2

Leap of a Thousand Years

Chapter 3

Digging Up Secrets of the Past

Chapter 4

The Polturnip and the Leafe

Chapter 5

The Artist's Treasure Hunt

Chapter 6

The Island of Trials

Chapter 7

Crack the Cog, Free our Future

What are Some Other Activities to Complete in Fantasy Life I?

Fantasy Life I is not just about rushing through the story missions; players can find several activities to complete at every step as they explore the past, present, and future worlds on the back of their Bone Dragon.

For starters, there are 14 lives in the game that players can start and use each of their abilities to complete several side activities in the game. These lives have their own leveling system, and you'll need to grind activities for each one to gain mastery rank in that life.

In addition to lives, there are personal quests that you'll take on after speaking to several interesting NPCs throughout the journey. These quests are rather short, but allow players to get a good insight into the inhabitants of this magical world.

Players can also explore the huge map of Ginormosia . It's divided into different regions, each having a biome and a life of its own. There are minor quests to complete in every direction. For example, discovering leafes and getting rewarded for them. These are just some of the activities that players can indulge in while visiting the mystical world of Fantasy Life I, and this content can prolong your completion time by a lot.

Following a Dragon's Clues, We Arrived at this Mysterious Island
An uninhabited isle somewhere in the seas of Reveria. On this island lies a mystery that no one has been able to solve. A gaping hole, a dragon made of bone, and a girl's message that begs you to save the world. This is your story, a thousand years in the making.

Create Your Own Unique Avatar
Adjust your face, your hair, and so much more, however you wish! Create another identity and depart for Reveria!

Numerous Lives to Make Yours Brighter
The different lives in Fantasy Life function a little like different jobs. Each has its own characteristics and provides various ways to enjoy yourself.

Effortless Switching with Quick Life Change
With the new Quick Life Change feature, you can instantly switch between many different Lives.

Shape the Island! Create Your Town!
Gather resources one thousand years in the past to restore the island in its present. Create a unique island just for you!

The Largest Open World in the Series - Ginormosia
Explore the largest continent in the Fantasy Life series and unravel the mysteries of the island.

Spread the Fun! Multiplayer
Supports up to 4 players online/locally. Invite friends to your meticulously crafted island, embark on resource-gathering quests together, the ways to play are endless!

Support via 2 Player Family Co-Op
If you have two controllers, one player can join the adventure as your travel companion, Trip, without needing to connect online.

item.title: Elden Ring Nightreign: How To Get Lightning Weapons For Augur & Darkdrift Knight
item.description:
Weapons in Elden Ring Nightreign come with various elemental affinities that can have a huge impact during the fight against a Nightlord. If players take the time to find the right weapon with an affinity against which a boss is weak, they'll have a much easier time dealing with it. Using the right affinity can ensure that you deal a high amount of damage to a boss, and even stagger them with ease. So, here's how you can find lightning affinity weapons to use against Augur and Darkdrift Knight Nightlords in Nightreign .

How To Get Lightning Affinity Weapons for Augur & Darkdrift Knight In Elden Ring Nightreign

Players can find out the weakness of the Nightlords in the Augur and Darkdrift Knight expeditions by checking out the affinity icon next to their avatar.

Lightning weapons and spells in general do extra damage to foes in Elden Ring Nightreign , but they'll be a lot more effective against Nightlords that have lightning affinity as their weakness. So, this makes finding lightning-infused weapons worth it, and they're sometimes easily available around the land of Limveld.

One of the best ways to look for lightning weapons and spells is to check out the major points of interest marked on your map. If you look towards the bottom-right corner of the landmarks, you'll find them marked with affinity icons. You'll need to figure out which landmark has a bolt icon next to it, and then travel there with your party.

Once you reach the area, make sure to take out the minor enemies first, and then focus all your attacks against the field boss of that particular landmark. Once the boss is down, there's a high chance you'll get some kind of lightning-infused weapon or spell from it. Additionally, you can search around the area, checking chests and breakable boxes to find more lightning-infused gear.

If you still haven't found the gear you were looking for, simply progress through the expedition as normal and keep an eye out for lightning affinity gear as you visit other locations.

How Does the Lightning Affinity Affect Maris and Fulghor?

Both Nightlords of Augur and Darkdrift Knight expeditions are weak to lightning damage , which will make the boss fight easier for players who step into the battle with the right gear.

When it comes to Darkdrift Knight's Nightlord Fulghor , it has a phase where it charges up the spear and plunges it into the ground. This attack will send out spears towards all party members, and can make the fight difficult to manage. However, hitting the boss with a lightning-based weapon or spell completely skips this phase, and even staggers the boss for a bit.

When it comes to Maris , it doesn't have the same effect as Fulghor, but it'll take increased damage when hit with lightning-based attacks. The boss is often floating around the battlefield, so it's recommended to use lightning spells for it, as it'll be tricky to land melee hits.
